Text.Value: Try to peer through the illusion.
Flumphs - largely benign parasites. But what do you know of their love lives?
*The cover is cool in your hand. And very slightly sticky.*

EditorData.CinematicNodeContext: Player holding the closed book, inspecting the cover

Text.Value: *Mad supposition, questionable diagrams, and many gleeful references to 'tentacles'. Not an overly academic text.*

EditorData.CinematicNodeContext: Player opens the book and studies the text before them

Text.Value: *Underdark fauna is a topic much written-on - but this title has never appeared in any collection you've seen.*

EditorData.CinematicNodeContext: Player opens the book and studies the text before them

Text.Value: Flumphs - largely benign parasites. But what do you know of their love lives?
*Flumphs reproduce asexually - this text contends exactly the opposite, with far too vivid details to match.*

EditorData.CinematicNodeContext: Player opens the book and studies the text before them

Text.Value: *Strain as you might, your eyes find nothing but an overly detailed description of the flumph's reproductive process.*

EditorData.CinematicNodeContext: Player opens the book and studies the text before them

Text.Value: *It is exactly what it appears to be - a rather stained and unsavoury look at the mating rituals of the common flumph.*

EditorData.CinematicNodeContext: Player opens the book and studies the text before them

Text.Value: Browse the contents.
Put it away.
*What remains are simple instructions written in a spare hand: the secret to forging adamantine.*

EditorData.InternalNodeContext: This end node will trigger the translated string to open, so player is reading the "decoded" text.

Text.Value: *Nothing. Flumphs are nomadic creatures, not well-suited to detailed study.*

EditorData.CinematicNodeContext: Player opens the book and studies the text before them

Text.Value: Examine the book closely.
Recall what you know of this title.
*The scrutiny proves too much. The lurid text melts away before your eyes - an illusion.*

EditorData.CinematicNodeContext: Player examining open book - VFX Material overlay of text disappearing

Text.Value: Put it away.
Recall what you know of this title.
*The cover proudly announces this book to be: 'Flumph Mating Rituals'.*

EditorData.CinematicNodeContext: Player holding the closed book, inspecting the cover

Text.Value: *If the drow's corpse is to be believed, it's something else entirely.*

EditorData.CinematicNodeContext: Player holding the closed book, inspecting the cover

Text.Value: Flumphs - largely benign parasites. But what do you know of their love lives?

Synopsis:
This book is recovered from the body of Xargrim, a wizard searching for the Adamantine Forge. It contains instructions on how to operate the forge, but is disguised as a rather smutty "nature" textbook.

Flumph = FLUMF.
